sentences.en: ...the wage differential between blue-collar and white-collar workers.
sentences.cn: …蓝领与白领工作人员之间的工资差别。

sentences.en: After studying differential calculus you will be able to solve these mathematical problems.
sentences.cn: 学了微积分之后,你们就能够解这些数学题了.

sentences.en: Armiger found differential tolerance to Al among soybean varieties.
sentences.cn: 阿尔米格尔发现大豆各品种对铝有不同的耐性.

sentences.en: Bell gages may be used to measure gage pressure or differential pressure.
sentences.cn: 浮钟式压力计可以用来测量计示压力或差压力.

sentences.en: Combination yarns can also be texturized with differential bulk effects.
sentences.cn: 混合股线也可用差异膨化效应来变形.

sentences.en: differential treatment of part-time and full-time staff
sentences.cn: 对兼职员工和全职员工的区别对待

sentences.en: Gage pressure is a special case of differential pressure.
sentences.cn: 计示压力是差压力的一种特殊情况.

sentences.en: Germany and France pledged to maintain the differential between their two currencies.
sentences.cn: 德国和法国承诺保持两国货币之间的差别汇率。

sentences.en: His doctoral dissertation on differential equations connected itself with existence theorems.
sentences.cn: 他论述微分方程的博士论文涉及到存在理论.

sentences.en: His participation in actual physical surveys stimulated his interest in differential geometry.
sentences.cn: 他亲身参加实际的物理测量,激起了他对微分几何学的兴趣.

sentences.en: His work remains mathematically in the realm of ordinary differential equations.
sentences.cn: 他的工作在数学上就停留在常微分方程的范围.

sentences.en: I'm specializing in differential and integral calculus.
sentences.cn: 我正专攻微分学和积分学.

sentences.en: In 1728 Euler gave differential equations for geodesics on surfaces.
sentences.cn: 1728年,奥伊勒绘出了曲面上测地线的微方程.

sentences.en: The overwhelming majority of nonlinear differential equations are not soluble analytically.
sentences.cn: 绝大多数非线性微分方程是不能用解析方法求解的.

sentences.en: There is a price differential between different types of oil.
sentences.cn: 不同种类的油有价格差异.

sentences.en: This is called a normal system of differential equations.
sentences.cn: 这称为正规微分方程组.

sentences.en: To some extent, his work pays dividends in differential equations.
sentences.cn: 他的工作在某种程度上给微分方程带来了好处.

words.tran_cn: 分化型；已分化的；可区分的
[自] 微分器；微分电路；区分者

phrases.tran_cn: 差分放大器；减法电路放大器；推挽式放大器
差动保护；比例制动式纵差保护
n. 不均匀沉降；[化]沉降差

trans.tran_cn: 差别的，特意的，[数]微分的，[机，物]差动的
trans.tran_en: based on or depending on a difference

trans.tran_cn: [数]微分，差别，工资级差，[机]差动器
trans.tran_en: a difference between things, especially between the wages of people doing different types of jobs in the same industry or profession
